short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop online & pay with Bitcoin - AceCard delivers!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop online & pay with Bitcoin - AceCard delivers!
Go to an amazon product page and using AceCard, scan the page for products. after entering your shipping info you can checkout and pay using your bitcoin wallet by scanning the QR code in the checkout page. 
You can shop with bitcoin without giving your address or create an account on e-commerce websites using AceCard!
Amazon US & CA supported.
** More sites will be supported in the next updates.
